I=C2=A0forget to address the Cult thing.=C2=A0 

Yes it is a Cult when you =
don't look at common sense and search for=C2=A0ideas outside of your "NORM"=
=C2=A0 More than that, it is very much a cult when you are shot down, ridic=
uled and basically called everything other than a human-being when you ques=
tion an idea of a group.

I have huge amounts of sympathy for this idea.=C2=
=A0 I understand loss.=C2=A0 This is extremely difficult for me to express.=


If this is a faith based thing, then so be it.=C2=A0 I walk away and bles=
s you, wish you well.=C2=A0 More than that I will be there for you if you n=
eed to talk.

But if this is a thing of Science, then it needs to be unders=
tood and examined.=C2=A0 It needs to be looked at in an unbiased light, for=
 what it is.=C2=A0 It needs to be studied.

Now there are a lot of people h=
ere that are going to kiss=C2=A0Frank's ass for a box.=C2=A0 And anytime a =
person meets with resistance over simple questions.=C2=A0 That is cause for=
 concerns.=C2=A0 It has a Cult feel.=C2=A0 (I should know I was raised a Se=
venth Day Adventist) LOL=C2=A0 I am just saying LOL

=C2=A0"Nature is showi=
ng us only the tail of the lion, but I have no doubt that the lion belongs =
to it even though, because of its large size, it cannot totally reveal itse=
lf all at once." 
-=E2=80=94 Albert Einstein 


"It is far better to grasp =
the universe as it really is than to persist in delusions, however satisfyi=
ng and reassuring."
--Carl Sagan


"There is no such thing as an insignific=
ant detail. Don't just look 
for what you want to find."
-- Me LOL

f the Democrat party and a very proud American.=C2=A0 I have nothing to hid=
e and love people for who they are.=C2=A0 I just ask for the same back.

I =
am a Paranormal Investigator and have been for several years.=C2=A0 Prior t=
o that I was an Investigator here in the Beautiful State of Tennessee for a=
pproximately ten years.

I have not been able to be that active with any fi=
eld research in a while because I was=C2=A0the primary Caregiver for a term=
ly ill person for the past six years.=C2=A0 But I did and still do research=
 work.

Is there anything else you would like to know?=C2=A0 Oh, and who th=
e hell are you? LOL

e size, it cannot totally reveal itself all at once."

nstein

ersist in delusions, however satisfying and reassuring."

ere is no such thing as an insignificant detail. Don't just look 
for what =
you want to find."

<DIV id=3Dygrp-text>
<P></P>
<DIV>&n=
bsp;Wow! I am amazed.That' s pretty much what I heard! Very rare! See the s=
keptics acuse people of only hearing what's labled, and we just had an=
other round and round about that last week. Thanks!</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>=

<DIV> F-S<BR><BR></DIV>
<DIV class=3Dgmail_quote>On Tue, Jun 1, 2010 =
at 12:34 AM, Tim <SPAN dir=3Dltr><<A rel=3Dnofollow>tjwoolwo@syr. edu</A=
>></SPAN> wrote:<BR>
<BLOCKQUOTE class=3Dgmail_quote style=3D"BORDER-LEF=
T: #ccc 1px solid">
<DIV style=3D"BACKGROUND-COLOR: #fff"><SPAN> </SPA=
N> 
<DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV>
<P>Frank,<BR><BR>Very interesting. It's been a while =
since I've listenend to your files. The fm on this tuner sounds really acti=
ve; the Others are definitely chatty on this band. <BR><BR>This is what I h=
ear (in studio grade headphones):<BR><BR>Your AM file @ 03 secs: "Here Prin=
 Cess" (male + two escalating tones)<BR>@ 11 secs: "Be sure (static) good n=
ews" (male)<BR><BR>Your FM file @ 01 secs: "Trying to get through" (in fema=
le tones)<BR>@ 03 secs: "It don't ?boost? right" (male then two tones)<BR>@=
 05 secs: "Closer to cooperating? " (male, first vowel sound is hard and se=
cond vowel sound in this word is a soft 'a' or 'o' so it cannot be calamity=
)<BR>@ 06 secs: "Till we're done" (female, fast)<BR>@ 08 secs: "Frank" (mal=
e)<BR>@ 09 secs: "Hi" (female singing, drawn out) <BR>@ 11 secs: "How you d=
oing" (male)<BR>@ 14 secs: "Hi" (female or child)<BR><BR>Tim W. </P>
<DIV>
=
<DIV></DIV>
<DIV class=3Dh5><BR><BR>--- In <A rel=3Dnofollow>EVP-ITC@yahoog=
roups .com</A>, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@ ...> wrote:<BR>><=
BR>> This is case no one was wondering. In the AM video at 9 seconds "th=
is is<BR>> Otto", an ever present past life friend. In FM at 5 seconds "=
gettin' closer<BR>> to calamity" Calamityville horror? Who's Thomas Pane=
? (at the)<BR>> <BR>> F-S<BR>><BR><BR></DIV></DIV>
<P></P></DIV>
